title: Support Ticket Rioter Misunderstood on Account Selling
body: I sent in a ticket about 2 days ago on a user who I found was selling his/her League account on a third-party website and sent in a ticket about this report the behavior along with the evidence. I received a response just today but the Rioter was misunderstood or just simply didn't read the ticket and thought the report was on MMR Boosting or Elo Boosting which it's not, can someone please take a look at that report? thanks.

replies.body: No worries, they probably just got a wire crossed when they read your ticket. I'll poke them to get them to take another look for ya though!
